website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, warm, and attractive; however, the connectivity and sound are just OK.
pros: Soft, knitted polyester and acrylic material feels warm and comfortable on the head
A full charge can provide 6 hrs of battery life
Headphones can be removed to wash the beanie
Comes in 3 neutral shades that go nicely with most winter attire
cons: Short range, so you may lose Bluetooth connection if you keep your phone at a distance
Sound quality isn't the best, especially for calls

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, works well
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a gift. He's been enjoying it for winter commuting. He says the sound quality is pretty decent, and I think he likes not having to keep track of ear buds. It does keep trying to pair if he doesn't turn it off at home, which confused us a few times as we heard something talking down the hall late at night as it tried to pair with a phone that was a bit too far away. Lesson: turn it off when you're not using it! Our 4-year-old has also discovered that she can listen to music on the hat, and will appropriate it sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Wear while ice skating. I have used this brand before and still works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winter must have.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who plows. He absolutely loves it. His only complaint is it’s a little quiet to try and hear while talking on the phone. Would totally buy another if the women’s version didn’t cost so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great for running in the cold
customer_reviews.text: I love this beenie great for running on cold day washer safe what more could you as for
customer_reviews.author: luis t delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beanie, using it to listen to audio books while walking, great sound quality and comfortable to wear. Haven’t used the microphone yet so cannot comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Britfan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son during Christmas. He is so hard to shop for because he has everything. He loved this gift! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece at Christmas and she loved it! I tried it for just a sec and was pretty impressed with sound quality. Actually considering getting one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Richard Wade

customer_reviews.title: I love this beanie
customer_reviews.text: I love this beanie. It's not only attractive but I love not having to wear my earbuds with a hat because they're already built in! We initially had trouble pairing the beanie to our phones (operator error) but Enjoybot customer service was responsive and we were up and running immediately. The battery life is longer than my wireless earbuds so that's a great bonus too.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash and convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: We had to buy a second one because my son kept using it. Easy to wash and convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Stiegmann

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME PRODUCT. I purchased this for my father because he loves to listen to his music, and wears a beanie, so I thought hey best of both worlds. He loves it, wears it everyday and couldn't be happier. I would so buy again, and again, and again.
customer_reviews.author: Soarockah

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is good and it is easy to pair to various devices
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hat for my son and he loves it. He wears it all the time. The sound quality is good and it is easy to pair to various devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: No extra headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. the Knit cap is very warm. The wireless component works as it is supposed to work and I do not have to take extra headphones out when walking the dog or running.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Shorter

customer_reviews.title: The volume might not be the best because the headphones aren't 100% on your ear
customer_reviews.text: People need to understand, it is a beanie with headphones, not headphones as a beanie. The volume might not be the best because the headphones aren't 100% on your ear, but you can put them loud and you'll be fine, the only thing is that people besides you might hear a bit as well. I'm annoyed that when you put volume on max. it says 'Volume Maximum' and cuts of the music... if not 5 stars-
customer_reviews.author: Martín

customer_reviews.title: Need to keep your phone close.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. She’s an avid runner and lives where it’s been cold, so she’s getting lots of use out of this. She says that buyers should know that the range is short, so your phone needs to be close. Her back pocket was too far away. Front pocket was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: It is trash
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a week. I used it twice and the 3rd time I used it, it would not be found by my phone or any other phone in my shop. I fully charged it and still no luck. Will not buy or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Mosqueda

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars only because I didn’t receive my third hat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these hats from enjoybot for xmas presents , (black , grey and charcoal) they were a big hit , only problem was the charcoal hat wasn’t going to be in until after Xmas. I never did receive the charcoal one but wasn’t sure who to get ahold of to let them know. I would have gave 5 stars if I received what I had paid for
customer_reviews.author: carrie sakow

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. He says it’s warm and feels comfortable. But sound is poor quality. Maybe because it’s Bluetooth and speakers are not near. Otherwise it good.
customer_reviews.author: Ilonka

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is that it is difficult to determine if the headset is on or not and it is nearly impossible to plug it in to the charger without removing the unit from the beanie. Otherwise it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use works great good speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son, he loves it. I was worried that with my son's well larger head it would be to short or tight but the hat was perfect. The speakers are easy to take out so the hat can be washed. It changed fully in about 3 hours and lasted one full day and part of day two. Easy to connect to phone. Will update if any problems arise.
customer_reviews.author: Lindseyg1220

customer_reviews.title: Great gift but broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit as a Christmas gift for my 13yo. He wore it daily and loved it. I loved that it can be washed. He would even listen to the TV through his hat thanks to the Roku remote app on his phone. Unfortunately after 6 months, the charger port broke so now it is only a hat.
customer_reviews.author: RockiesMama

customer_reviews.title: Fab for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly great item for the price! Love the sound quality and the fact that you can’t really hear the music if you take it off (so no one else hears)... THUMBS UP and I might get the other color.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica I. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Teen boy approved
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these. One for my son, one for the gift exchange he had at gym. The kid that got this was happy and my son loves his. He even figured out how to take it apart to wash the hat.
customer_reviews.author: Yadi

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Giving this two stars because the hat itself is made well, comfortable and warm. The headphones will not stay connected and cut out constantly. I couldn't keep my phone in my pants pocket, then moved my phone to my shirt pocket and they still cut out. This product cannot perform its primary purpose for existing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great until it died
customer_reviews.text: This hat was a birthday present for my husband, who needed something bluetooth enabled to listen to his music privately instead of blasting it for everyone in the neighborhood to hear. This hat was wonderful.. until it died after 3 months of use. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: licialowoke

customer_reviews.title: Garbled communications even at short distance
customer_reviews.text: Claims 33’ Bluetooth reception but can barely go 10’ without it getting garbled even when fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: CEB

customer_reviews.title: Call quality is awful, but listening to music is fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my outdoorsy husband to have handsfree calls- but the call sound quality is awful and echos. I am probably just going to keep it for myself to listen to audio books or music while doing chores.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work from day one. Music would cut out continuously. Had to return.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps head warm while your rocking in the cold.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good for the price. Easy to connect via BT. It's a little small for larger heads. But I managed to stretch it down enough. Battery seems to last for about 3 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Best gift this year
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son in law for christmas. He loves it..he can talk on Phone and listen to music at work and stay warm.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for our grandson as he walks to school. He was very excited.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Everything’s good about it except the main button to power up and power down 🎼

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant idea, better than bluetooth earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great sound. The amazing part is you feel like the sound is coming from somewhere from your head :)

customer_reviews.title: Don't no

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: These hats are super comfortable. The music sounds really good that comes out of the speakers. And they cover right over your ears.Very good product.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage connection do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and click the “back” button. This beanie is garbage with horrible range. Seriously, my Samsung Note 8 has no issue pairing and staying connected with any other Bluetooth device. This beanie is akin to listening to AM radio in a train tunnel. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: BnB

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget
customer_reviews.text: This was such a hit with my family at Christmas, I had to buy 2 additional hats for the entire family to have

customer_reviews.title: Comfy hreay for working outside with hands free portable music and ohone
customer_reviews.text: The sound isn't quite loud enough allows in way too much background noise

customer_reviews.title: So buckle up.
customer_reviews.text: So the sound is okay. The battery life is also okay. You can have your connected device in your pocket and the sound still cut out periodically, so that's annoying. It is still admittedly pretty damn cool and convenient when it does work though.

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and keeps me warm. Not noise cancelling so I can still keep conversations with people. Only thing about it is when you are making a call, the other person can hear themselves when they speak. Other than that this is pretty cool. Looking to buy updated version.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: it does work good and the sound is good
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes it, but it doesn't have an on/off switch so the battery goes dead between uses. Have to plan ahead to keep it charged so it's less convenient than he hoped. However, it does work good and the sound is good.

customer_reviews.title: Minnesota approved!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat! I live in bitter cold MN and was looking for a hat to wear for my daily walks and have had it for about 6 months. Not only is it stylish and functional - it also surpassed my expectations in quality (material and sound!) It's very easy to wash as well. Great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: Good for cool weather

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound is much better than expected, and is very comfortable to wear. People can hear me pretty well when making the call; I have been told a couple times I was a little quiet but typically no issues. Is great for when I'm walking the dog or doing yard work. Issues I've had are an occasional disconnect followed by immediate reconnect, and sometimes I have to keep it in a specific pocket or the sound will skip. Used with OnePlus 5 and pixel 2 XL.

Perfect for someone who likes to take walks with music/podcasts or to take calls. Plus we can laugh about our car calling his hat, bluetooth is fun.

product_meta.title: Enjoybot Bluetooth Beanie Wireless Knit Winter Hats Cap with Built-in Stereo Speakers and Microphone for Outdoor Sports
feature_bullets: Fashion & Tech Combine: Super soft Acrylic and Polyester trendy knit beanie, keep you head warm while also listening or making calls with hands free via the newest bluetooth technology.

The Newest Bluetooth Technology: Equipped with high efficiency Bluetooth wireless technology, easy and fast to pair with all the Bluetooth enabled media devices, such as smartphone, iPhone, iPad, tablet, Android, MP3, MP4, digital media player and more. Wireless range up to 33 feet.

Ultra-long Talking & Music Time: Built-in rechargeable Li-Ion battery, 6 hours playtime, 60 hours standby time with only 1.5 hours charging time, you haven't to concern its battery when enjoying it anymore.

Simple Button Operation: The User-friendly design operating button built-in wireless stereo speaker and microphone ,it is convenient for you to skip back and forth through your playlist, answer and hang up calls without having to use your phone.

Easily Washable & Practical to Any Occasion & Warranty: Easy to wash after taking out the built-in bluetooth module. A great companion in outdoor, car, beach, park, office, conference room, home and much more! We warranty each and every Enjoybot Bluetooth Beanie 1 year to be free of defects in using. And we will replace your damaged or defective Enjoybot Bluetooth Beanie with a new one.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars463 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
